attributes.action: allow all cadets that are part of drill team in the atc to wear no1 uniform
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currenly only CWOs and bandsmen and woman are allowed to wear no1 uniform in the Air Traing Corp. I propose that cadets that are a part of a well established drill squad/team should be allowed to wear no1 uniform at the squadron commanders discretion.
